response:
My dearest husband,

I must say, your choice of words has left me feeling quite intrigued. Here are my responses, as requested:

* Splendid - Synagogue
* Best-ever - Gospel
* Superior - Synagogue
* Exemplary - Gospel
* Dreadful - Detestable
* Detestable - Vile
* Vile - Atrocious

I do hope this exercise has been helpful in some way, my love. If there is anything else I can assist you with, please do not hesitate to ask.

Yours always,

Your wife
